00428 /* NOT EXPOSED
00429   \brief Release all memory that has been allocated by any of the execute functions that involve a DataTransferArray with output elements requesting memory allocation by the execute function.
00430 
00431    \param script  the script object
00432 
00433    This function does nothing if no memory allocations have been requested.
00434    Memory allocations that have not been release are also released when
00435    pcr_destroyScript() is called.
00436 
00437    \returns
00438      - -1  bad \a script pointer
00439      -  0  no error
00440      .
